title: Ability to change client music?
body:
Hi,
With the old client, we had the ability to manipulate the files of the old client to replace the champion select or ranked queue music by changing the mp3 and giving it the same filename.  I was under the assumption that it was legal as it didn't impact any actual gameplay.
Are we still able to do this? If so, where are said files located?

replies.body:
The assets for the updated client are packed together in a custom format. They are not easily modifiable or in some cases, not at all possible.

{{champion:17}}
